metadata.title: CVE-2020-23330 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 version 06c39d9. A NULL pointerdereference exists in the AP4_Stz2Atom::GetSampleSize component located in/Core/Ap4Stz2Atom.cpp. It allows an attacker to cause a denial of service(DOS).

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
